Package com.espertech.esper.jdbc.server.remote

JDBC remote network server classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JDBCEndpointConnectionFilter
    Interface for filtering incoming connections based on connection information in the connection request.

    ConnectionInformation  
    JDBCEndpoint
    JDBC remote (network) server endpoint.
    JDBCEndpointConfiguration
    Configuration of the JDBC endpoint.
    JDBCEndpointConstants
    Endpoint constants.
